p: The ratio of linoleic (ω-6)-to-α-linolenic (ω-3) acids approaches 4:1 indicating a positive nutritional profile of all hemp products, according to a consensus recommendation of several nutritional societies [ 30]. This property candidate’s hemp oil and derived resources among the food matrices with an optimal PUFA balance, against an average ω-6 to ω-3 ratio of about 10:1 that currently is characterizing the diet of industrialized countries.
